review: After our house was broken into and out PS3 stolen, I was looking for a new way to watch streaming TV that wasn't as expensive as a new gaming system. I wish I had gotten the Fire Stick much sooner. Very easy to use and has access to all of our streaming apps (Netflix hulu youtube). I love the mobility of it as you can take it from on TV to another. Although the price is low enough to get a couple of them for multiple TV's. I would definitely recommend and would be again if needed.
author: Meagan Klutz
